<bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 10:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> J. 10, 3</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">alicui materno a sanguine jungi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:2:368" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 2, 368</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">alicui sanguine cohaerere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:8:3:75" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 8, 3, 75</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">progeniem Trojano a sanguine duci,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:1:19" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 1, 19</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">genus alto a sanguine Teucri,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 4, 230</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Semiramio Polydaemona sanguine cretum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:5:85" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 5, 85</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sanguine cretus Sisyphio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,010:13:31" default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 13, 31</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nostri quoque sanguinis auctor Juppiter est,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,010:13:142" default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 13, 142</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nec iis tantum quos sanguine attingit amandus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:7:24:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 7, 24, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sanguinem sociare,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:4:4:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 4, 4, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Tiridates sanguinis ejusdem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:6:32" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 6, 32</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n42533.6" n="b" level="4"> Concr., <hi rend="ital">a descendant</hi>, <hi rend="ital">offspring</hi>: o pater, o genitor, o sanguen dis oriundum! Enn. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,043:1:41:64" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Rep. 1, 41, 64</bibl>; and id. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Prisc.</author> p. 708</bibl> P. (Ann. v. 117 Vahl.); cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">non magis in alienis, quam in proximis ac sanguine ipso suo exerceret,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:7:4:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 7, 4, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">in suum sanguinem saevire,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:40:5:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 40, 5, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Alexandri sanguis et stirps,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:10:6:10" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 10, 6, 10</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">suum sanguinem perditum ire,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:4:66" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 4, 66</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">3, 4</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ne secus quam suum sanguinem (eum) foveret ac tolleret,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 4, 8</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1044,001:1:10:5" default="NO"><author>Vell.</author> 1, 10, 5</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1038,001:5:9:4" default="NO"><author>Val. Max.</author> 5, 9, 4</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">seu deos regesve canit, deorum Sanguinem, etc.,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:4:2:14" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 4, 2, 14</bibl></cit>: clarus Anchisae Venerisque sanguis (i. e. <hi rend="ital">Æneas</hi>), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,002:50" default="NO"><author>id.</author> C. S. 50</bibl>: regius sanguis (i. e. <hi rend="ital">Europa</hi>), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:3:27:65" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> C. 3, 27, 65</bibl>: vos, o Pompilius sanguis (i. e. <hi rend="ital">the Pisos</hi>), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,006:292" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> A. P. 292</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">non ego, pauperum Sanguis parentum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:2:20:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> C. 2, 20, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">pro sanguine tuo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:5:515" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 5, 515</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sanguis meus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:6:836" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 6, 836</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">tuus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0660,001:1:6:66" default="NO"><author>Tib.</author> 1, 6, 66</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,001:3:559" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> Th. 3, 559</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n42533.7" n="2" level="3"> Of other fluids (rare): <cit><quote lang="la">et viridis nemori sanguis decedit et herbis,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Manil.</author> 5, 212</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Baccheus,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>wine</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,001:1:329" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> Th. 1, 329</bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:14:58" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 14, 5, 7, § 58</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">Pallas amat turgentes sanguine baccas,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Nemes.</author> Ecl. 2, 50</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n42533.8" n="II" level="1"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg>, <hi rend="ital">vigor</hi>, <hi rend="ital">strength</hi>, <hi rend="ital">force</hi>, <hi rend="ital">spirit</hi>, <hi rend="ital">life</hi> (class.), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,004:1:2:45" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Bacch. 1, 2, 45</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">amisimus, mi Pomponi, omnem non modo sucum ac sanguinem, sed etiam colorem et speciem pristinam civitatis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:4:18:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Att. 4, 18, 2</bibl></cit> (4, 16, 10); cf. <cit><quote lang="la">Sall. Fragm. Or. Lepidi, § 25: vos o, quibus integer aevi Sanguis, ait, solidaeque suo stant robore vires,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:2:639" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 2, 639</bibl></cit>: quae cum de sanguine detraxisset aerarii, <hi rend="ital">had bled the treasury</hi> (the figure taken from blood-letting), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,005:3:36:section=83" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Verr. 2, 3, 36, § 83</bibl>; cf.: cum <foreign lang="greek">e)c a)faire/sews</foreign> provinciam curarit, sanguinem miserit, etc., <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:6:1:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Att. 6, 1, 2</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">missus est sanguis invidiae sine dolore,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 1, 16, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">qui ab illo pestifero ac perdito civi jam pridem rei publicae sanguine saginantur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,022:36:78" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Sest. 36, 78</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">illa in agendis causis jam detrita: Jugulum petere et Sanguinem mittere...nec offendunt tamen,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:8:6:51" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 8, 6, 51</bibl></cit>.—Of <hi rend="ital">vigor</hi>, <hi rend="ital">force</hi> of style: <cit><quote lang="la">sucus ille et sanguis incorruptus usque ad hanc aetatem oratorum fuit, in quā naturalis inesset, non fucatus nitor,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,039:9:36" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Brut. 9, 36</bibl></cit>: orationis subtilitas etsi non <cb n="SANI" /> plurimi sanguinis est, etc., <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,040:23:76" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Or. 23, 76</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">sanguine et viribus niteat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:8:3:6" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 8, 3, 6</bibl></cit>; so (with vires) <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:10:2:12" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 10, 2, 12</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">Calvus metuens, ne vitiosum colligeret, etiam verum sanguinem deperdebat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,039:82:283" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Brut. 82, 283</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">dicta plena sanguinis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:11:1:34" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 11, 1, 34</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sanguinem ipsum ac medullam verborum ejus eruere atque introspicere penitus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:18:4:2" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 18, 4, 2</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
